ref_criterion: Presents in an organized manner all the steps needed to be followed, all the types of braces available with pros and cons, the hygiene required, and the long-term maintenance. This is a scenario where the user must have all the proper information before seeing an orthodontist, as braces are costly, and the teenager needs to be ready to go through the lengthy process.
